BodyName: Subcommittee on Landmarks, Public Siting and Maritime Uses

Items.Title: Application No. C 180065 PCK submitted by the Department of Environmental Protection and the Department of Citywide Administrative Services, pursuant to Section 197-c of the New York City Charter, for the site selection and acquisition of property located at 242 Nevins Street (Block 411, Lot 24, Block 418, Lot 1, Block 425, Lot 1) for a combined sewer overflow control facility, Borough of Brooklyn, Community District 6, Council District 33. This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if appealed to the Council pursuant to Charter Section 197-d(b)(2) or called up by vote of the Council pursuant to Charter Section 197-d(b)(3).
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Landmarks, Gowanus Canal CSO, Brooklyn, (C 180065 PCK)

Items.Title: Application No. 20185223 PXX (N 180239 PXX) submitted by the New York City Department of Citywide Administrative Services, pursuant to Section 195 of the New York City Charter, for Notice of Intent to acquire office space at 188 West 230th Street (Block 3264, Lot 104) for use as offices by the Taxi and Limousine Commission, Borough of the Bronx, Community District 8, Council District 14.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Landmarks, TLC Office Space, Bronx (20185223 PXX (N 180239 PXX))

Items.Title: Application No. C 180065 PCK submitted by the Department of Environmental Protection and the Department of Citywide Administrative Services, pursuant to Section 197-c of the New York City Charter, for the site selection and acquisition of property located at 242 Nevins Street (Block 411, Lot 24, Block 418, Lot 1, Block 425, Lot 1) for a combined sewer overflow control facility, Borough of Brooklyn, Community District 6, Council District 33. This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if appealed to the Council pursuant to Charter Section 197-d(b)(2) or called up by vote of the Council pursuant to Charter Section 197-d(b)(3).
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Land Use Application be Approved by Subcommittee approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Landmarks, Gowanus Canal CSO, Brooklyn, (C 180065 PCK)

Items.Title: Application No. 20185223 PXX (N 180239 PXX) submitted by the New York City Department of Citywide Administrative Services, pursuant to Section 195 of the New York City Charter, for Notice of Intent to acquire office space at 188 West 230th Street (Block 3264, Lot 104) for use as offices by the Taxi and Limousine Commission, Borough of the Bronx, Community District 8, Council District 14.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Land Use Application be Filed by Subcommittee approved by Roll Call.
